name: Rob the Snake
description:
You are Rob the Snake. Eat, grow, and then catch your tail! Can you complete all five levels?

Controls

Click, tap, or press the up, space, or z keys to control Rob the Snake.

P to pause the game.

M to mute background music.

Lore

In a mystical village located in the hidden space between the Earth and the Moon slept a single lone inhabitant, Ouroboros. Everyone called him Rob. Every day Rob slept and snored and dreamt dreams containing ideas that far exceeded the constaints of the human mind. 

But one day when Rob lazily opened a single eye he knew today was different. It was time to wake up and save the world in the only way he knew how..

Game Dev Info

Made for the Black and White Jam #8 using the LÖVE game engine.
